#label_about_the_series

Television series based on the two "Beastmaster" feature films about a world where barbarism and magic rule and Dar the Beastmaster uses his telepathic powers to communicate with animals, including his feathered and furry companions: Sharak, the eagle; Ruh, the tiger; and Kodo and Podo, two mischievous ferrets. Dar goes in search of his childhood sweetheart after his village is destroyed. Along the way, he helps people deal with all sorts of problems with the aid of his animal friends and Tao, his clumsy alchemist companion.

short_description: The legendary hero of fiction and film is back! Dar talks to animals, and with the help of his ferret sidekicks, marshals their strength to combat the schemes of their enemies.
